2020 Winner AFI Award
awardEventDetails.description: (GAME OF THRONES marches into history in its fiery finale - leaving behind a storytelling landscape forever changed. Across the years, David Benioff and D.B. Weiss set new standards for the crafts of television, overseeing an army of artists that collaborated to create worlds heretofore unimaginable - and this year, earning a permanent place on the throne as a defining cultural milestone for our time and for all time.)

awardEventDetails.title: 2018 Winner AFI Award
awardEventDetails.description: (GAME OF THRONES marches into its seventh year like an army of artists invading the global cultural consciousness. David Benioff and D.B. Weiss lead the charge on what endures as an unparalleled fantasy for television, but now lives beyond the screen and thrives in the hearts and minds of millions around the world. Family and foe - light and dark - fire and ice - all elements that fuel our imaginations with a cinematic spectacle unrivaled in modern day dreams.)

awardEventDetails.title: 2017 Winner AFI Award
awardEventDetails.description: (GAME OF THRONES rises from scorched earth and takes to wing toward resurrection, redemption and retribution. Having planted the seeds of Shakespearean tragedy on a scale rarely envisioned in the medium, David Benioff and D.B. Weiss unleash unholy vengeance across the map - delivering vicious ends for those deserving, and glimmers of dark hope even against lengthening shadows of encroaching winter.)

awardEventDetails.title: 2016 Winner AFI Award
awardEventDetails.description: (GAME OF THRONES unfurls its wings to even greater cinematic horizons. David Benioff and D.B. Weiss chart a course through the series' fifth year by exposing even its most powerful players to atavistic atrocities. This emphasis on the inhumanity of humanity evokes empathy for the most Machiavellian of monsters, as well as true horror when the blood of beloved heroes is spilled in snow.)

awardEventDetails.title: 2015 Winner AFI Award
awardEventDetails.description: (GAME OF THRONES continues to expand its epic scope in the fourth year, as masterminds David Benioff and D.B. Weiss unleash all sides in the bloody battle for Westeros, where revenge rules and kings fall. Presented on a continually unfurling canvas, the show finds the strength of its voice in the majesty of its humanity - embodied best this year by the towering presence of Peter Dinklage.)

AFI Awards, USA

2020 Winner AFI Award
TV Program of the Year
(GAME OF THRONES marches into history in its fiery finale - leaving behind a storytelling landscape forever changed. Across the years, David Benioff and D.B. Weiss set new standards for the crafts of television, overseeing an army of artists that collaborated to create worlds heretofore unimaginable - and this year, earning a permanent place on the throne as a defining cultural milestone for our time and for all time.)
2018 Winner AFI Award
TV Program of the Year
(GAME OF THRONES marches into its seventh year like an army of artists invading the global cultural consciousness. David Benioff and D.B. Weiss lead the charge on what endures as an unparalleled fantasy for television, but now lives beyond the screen and thrives in the hearts and minds of millions around the world. Family and foe - light and dark - fire and ice - all elements that fuel our imaginations with a cinematic spectacle unrivaled in modern day dreams.)
2017 Winner AFI Award
TV Program of the Year
(GAME OF THRONES rises from scorched earth and takes to wing toward resurrection, redemption and retribution. Having planted the seeds of Shakespearean tragedy on a scale rarely envisioned in the medium, David Benioff and D.B. Weiss unleash unholy vengeance across the map - delivering vicious ends for those deserving, and glimmers of dark hope even against lengthening shadows of encroaching winter.)
2016 Winner AFI Award
TV Program of the Year
(GAME OF THRONES unfurls its wings to even greater cinematic horizons. David Benioff and D.B. Weiss chart a course through the series' fifth year by exposing even its most powerful players to atavistic atrocities. This emphasis on the inhumanity of humanity evokes empathy for the most Machiavellian of monsters, as well as true horror when the blood of beloved heroes is spilled in snow.)
2015 Winner AFI Award
TV Program of the Year
(GAME OF THRONES continues to expand its epic scope in the fourth year, as masterminds David Benioff and D.B. Weiss unleash all sides in the bloody battle for Westeros, where revenge rules and kings fall. Presented on a continually unfurling canvas, the show finds the strength of its voice in the majesty of its humanity - embodied best this year by the towering presence of Peter Dinklage.)
